properties.areaDesc: Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:35PM CST until January 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds around 25 knots with
gusts up to 40 knots and rough waters through the evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 knots choppy
to rough waters expected overnight.

* WHERE...Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 9 PM CST this evening. For
the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 3 PM CST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong to very strong winds and/or increased seas
will result in hazardous marine conditions especially for
inexperienced mariners with smaller vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SATURDAY
